title: Cane Creek’s New 110 Ceramic Headset
content:
Cane Creek just announced a new 11O Ceramic headset ($199.99) that resides at the top end of the North Carolina manufacturer’s lineup…

This all-new design features the new, Hellbender Ceramic bearing that brings ultimate smoothness and longevity to the headset. These new bearings use ceramic Silicon Nitride balls, which are multiple times harder than steel and will not corrode.

Like existing 11O headsets, Cane Creek covers this new headset under their 11O Guarantee, promising to replace any part if the rider finds dissatisfaction with it – for as long as they own it. Cane Creek 11Os are the only headsets on the market for which all parts, including bearings, are satisfaction-guaranteed for life.

The 11O Ceramic features an eye-catching, dual-stage anodized cup and cover design as well as tighter, more robust weather sealing than the Fifty. As a cherry on top, it includes a matched set of Interlok spacers and a special top cap with a lightweight preload assembly.

Specs:

  • $199.99
  • Color: Black with dual stage silver anodized cuts
  • Headset IDs: IS41/IS52 | IS42/IS52 | ZS44/EC44 | ZS44/ZS56
  • Cups & Top Cover: 7075-T6 aluminum
  • Bearings: Hellbender Ceramic sealed cartridge bearings
  • Sealing: Steerer tube o-ring seal, dual lip top cover lip seal, co-molded crown race dual lip seal
  • Compression Ring: Carbon-friendly compression ring retained in top cover
  • Spacers: Custom 110 Ceramic machined Interlok spacers included (2x5mm, 1x10mm)
  • Stack Heights: IS41 & IS42 upper : 9mm | EC34 upper: 15mm, lower: 11mm | ZS44 & ZS56 upper : 8mm, lower: 4mm | EC44 lower: 11mm
  • Graphics: laser-etched Cane Creek logo and headset code for easy identification
  • Warranty: 11O Lifetime Guarantee

 

See more at Cane Creek.

The post Cane Creek’s New 110 Ceramic Headset appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
